Definition: You will see a sentence with a given pronoun and a question. Select the option that the pronoun refers to in the sentence. Answer with "A" or "B".

Positive Examples.input: This book introduced Shakespeare to Ovid; it was a fine selection of his writing., Pronoun: his, Question: (A) Shakespeare (B) Ovid
